message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $120 was a bit too high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product!
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that?

Hi Bob, I understand that $95 is still a bit above my minimum, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really like the product!

I appreciate your willingness to make a compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'd be willing to pay $92 for the product. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can meet me at this price.
